name: @pentacle/pepo-ui
description: out of the box design and styling for your semantic markup

scripts.build: cat src/css/layout.css src/css/card.css src/css/colors.css src/css/fonts.css src/css/typography.css src/css/navigation.css src/css/header.css src/css/lists.css src/css/tables.css src/css/forms.css src/css/links.css src/css/media.css src/css/tabs.css src/css/utility.css src/css/globals.css | postcss -o styles.css
